message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,000. It's a fantastic deal considering its value. Let me know your thoughts.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product is high, but I am only able to offer $9,500 for it. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
Bob, I appreciate your offer but $9,500 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $10,500. This is a fair price considering the value of the product. Let's see if we can make this work.
